title: Fat serif with high contrast
author: sanderpe

comments.content:
[Work](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071321/http:/www.astridstavro.com/cuadernos-postal) by Astrid Stavro.  
Should be [Grouch ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071321/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/itc-grouch) by Tom Carnase and Ronne Bonder. Alternative, more contrasted: [Grumpy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317071321/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/suomi/grumpy) by Suomi Tomi Haaparanta
